body.raw:
## Overview

A customer-facing display showing order details and advertisements, designed to fit various screen sizes.

## Technologies

- C#
- WPF

## Tasks

- Build desktop UI with C# + WPF
- Ensure layouts are responsive across screens
- Package and deploy the application

## Screenshots

- `/second-display.jpg`
